mil7.4.1:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pathaviyā pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.1:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, pathavī iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni kappūrāgarutagaracandanakuṅkumādīni ākirantepi pittasemhapubbaruhirasedamedakheḷasiṅghāṇikalasikamuttakarīsādīni ākirantepi tādisāyeva;
mil7.4.1:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena iṭṭhāniṭṭhe lābhālābhe yasāyase nindāpasaṃsāya sukhadukkhe sabbattha tādināyeva bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pathavī maṇḍanavibhūsanāpagatā sakagandhaparibhāvitā;
mil7.4.1:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vibhūsanāpagatena sakasīlagandhaparibhāvitena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pathavī nirantarā akhaṇḍacchiddā asusirā bahalā ghanā vitthiṇṇā;
mil7.4.1:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nirantaramakhaṇḍacchiddamasusirabahalaghanavitthiṇṇasīlena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pathavī gāmanigamanagarajanapadarukkhapabbatanadītaḷākapokkharaṇīmigapakkhimanujanaranārigaṇaṃ dhārentīpi akilāsu hoti;
mil7.4.1:4.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ovadantenapi anusāsantenapi viññāpentenapi sandassentenapi samādapentenapi samuttejentenapi sampahaṃsentenapi dhammadesanāsu akilāsunā bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:4.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:5.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anunayappaṭighavippamuttena pathavisamena cetasā viharitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:5.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pathaviyā pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.1:5.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, upāsikāya cūḷasubhaddāya sakasamaṇe parikittayamānāya—
